availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Lexington, Kentucky, merchant. Virginia native. Son of Jesse Johnson and Lettie Green. Married to Ellen Parker Johnson. Father of James Johnson, Mary Johnson, John Johnson, B. H. Johnson, Charles Johnson, Lavina Johnson and Robert Johnson. Merchant in Fayette County, Kentucky, in 1850. Merchant in Lexington in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, District No. 1, p. 118B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, Lexington, p. 364.
